author: Lee Seiu Kin J:
casename: Ganesh s/o M Sinnathamby v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Uthayasurian Sidambaram (Surian & Partners) for the appellant; Janet Wang (Attorney-General's Chambers) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Insolvency Law/Bankruptcy/Offences/Leaving jurisdiction without prior permission of Official Assignee/Whether there was compulsory custodial sentence on bankrupts contravening travel restrictions/Whether fact that offender already discharged bankrupt when proceedings commenced against him warranting departure from normal sentencing tariff/Section 131(1)(b) Bankruptcy Act (Cap 20, 2000 Rev Ed)
